title: League client doesn't open properly
body: So since 2 days ago my league client has been showing the icon with a "not-compatible" icon on top of it. Each time I press it a message pops up saying: "can't open the app 'league of legends' because its not compatible with this type of mac (OS X Yosemite version 10.10.5)". to open the launcher I have to go to contents/LoL/play league of legends. I also have the problem that my new league alpha client is not updating. please tell me why is this happening.

replies.body: Which icon are you having issues with? The icon on your doc or inside the applications folder?
Inside the applications folder and my Launch pad.

Hmm.. I've never seen this issue before. I suspect it may be linked to a corrupt installation of League, and I believe a clean reinstall could resolve this. You can complete this by grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), launching the app, then checking the boxes for *reinstall* and *clean uninstall* before hitting the **start** button. After the tasks have completed, launch League to complete patching. 

Let me know if this helped!
same for me but neither of them will open it even though earlier today i had it open
